First tip: keep the generation of the filenames separate from the usage of =
the filename. That way you can effectively test that you are generating app=
ropriate filenames for any given input data.

Next, create temp files (actu=
ally fairly easy in Java) and read or write them through your file access c=
ode and then check that you read or wrote what you expected to.

Hope this =
helps.

Simon
